channel.title: Atmospheric Water Harvesting on Giulio Barletta
channel.description: Recent content in Atmospheric Water Harvesting on Giulio Barletta

item.title: Exploring machine learning models to predict atmospheric water harvesting with an ion deposition membrane
item.description: This paper presents a novel Ion Deposition Membrane-based approach to atmospheric water harvesting, leveraging machine learning to predict water yields under various environmental conditions. Published in Journal of Water Process Engineering, 2025.

item.title: MLWaterHarvest
item.description: This repository contains the database and notebooks related to the publication Exploring machine learning models to predict atmospheric water harvesting with an ion deposition membrane
